name: The Cube Test
description:
It's a Cube.
Literally.
I don't know what else to write here.
I started working on theGame one day by adding a Cube and a Ground and controls and that was it. It grew with my skill I learned evry much and now it's here.
I will link/upload the other Versions that I have from it (V.1.05=V.1.08) some day ig.
Also so far it's only a Sandbox,
so Levels coming soon
Rated random/random
It's a Cube

(Also why is there no "Random" genre. And yes I do not like gramar.)
